Source code for ASI_Embedding.parallel_utils

from mpi4py import MPI



[docs]
def root_print(*args, **kwargs):
    "Prints only from the root node"

    rank = MPI.COMM_WORLD.Get_rank()

    if rank == 0:
        print(*args, **kwargs)
